OrgName.entry: DARNALL EDUCATION CENTRE ASSOCIATED TRAINING LTD (DECAT) - MOTOR MECHANICS TRAINING PROJECT

Desc.entry: A not-for-profit training organisation run in partnership with Sheffield Futures, which provides courses in motor mechanics including body repair, welding and fabrication. Aimed at disaffected young people and young people excluded from school. Provides courses for young people aged 14-16 years and 'Entry to Employment', vocational training for young people aged 16-18 years and music and media industry training. Self or any referral.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
